description:
#### New package name: __[cmdermini](https://chocolatey.org/packages/cmdermini)__

- - -

`cmdermini.portable` has been deprecated because of Chocolatey Community [Naming Conventions](https://github.com/chocolatey/choco/wiki/CreatePackages#naming-your-package). Community packages with an ID ending in `.install`/`.portable` are intended to indicate there are two possible methods for installing a program. If a user comes across one of these ID endings, it is expected an associated package with the corresponding ID ending also exists. The program `cmdermini` only provides a portable method so the simplest ID should be used.

This package exists only for backward compatibility to provide a transitional, empty dummy package for existing users and scripts which may still use this package ID.
author: Samuel Vasko
